1.14.4.3.1.7: Blazes will no longer use flame touch effect on push attacker away unless Flame Touch is set to true in config; entities will no longer crash server when trying to ride a spider mount; removed cave spiders from default spider rider list; Zombies can break blocks now
1.14.4.0.1.6: Fixed crash/bug with zombiepigman feature when player breaks blocks (see issue #32); Zombie Pigman features and AI should all work now
1.14.4.0.1.5: Added Blaze features and AI; Fixed attributes config issues; Fixed config issues for zombie equipment, zombie boss names, and zombie break blocks
1.14.4.0.1.4: Added initial Zombie Pigman support; Added abilities support
1.14.4.0.1.3: Fixed a crash caused by Serene Seasons compatibility (forgot to initialize the season whitelist); Fixed zombie boss spawning
1.14.4.0.1.2: More config options; Added spider config & features; Added hostile horse config & features
1.14.4.0.1.1: Added config system; lots of additional work to update from 1.12.2
